comments.text:
Created attachment 555062
Interent Explorer vs firefox taring off tabs

User Agent: Mozilla/5.0 (compatible; MSIE 9.0; Windows NT 6.1; WOW64; Trident/5.0; SLCC2; .NET CLR 2.0.50727; .NET CLR 3.5.30729; .NET CLR 3.0.30729; MDDC; .NET4.0C; Media Center PC 6.0)

Steps to reproduce:

Tear off existing tabs


Actual results:

The page didn't mimize and its hard to put it back into existing window cause I can't see the window behind it unless I mimize


Expected results:

In Internet Explorer and Chrome, the page mimizes, removing the frames, when tabs are being teared off.  This allows me to see the page behind it.
